description: Delete a material site inventory location.
permissions: Allowed for admins, broker members of the material site's broker, or manager members of the material site's material supplier.
side_effects: Deletes a material site inventory location record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. The --confirm flag must be set to true. Deletion is blocked if material type inventory location links exist (dependent records are restricted).

flags.name: confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to proceed.
